about_the_game:
For ambitious players seeking a challenge beyond HARD mode. Your battles will be brutal, intense, and thrilling. Continues and mid-battle item use are disabled.

Useful Item Set includes:
- Bead x2
- Chakra Pot x2
- Balm of Life x2
- Original Flame x1

You can select VERY HARD mode at a NEW GAME's outset, or switch to it by opening the main menu, the SYSTEM submenu, and then finding it in CONFIG.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Strong Language
